title: i got banned over 3 years and i am reformed
body: i got banned for somethings that for sure i have should not say. but i never got muted or multiple warnings like some of my other friends got. Ive spend well over 600 USD on this account. I have changed sense then i am more mature and older i am reformed. I take full responsibility in my actions. I just want to add one more thing i started playing lol sense S2 and back then u could say vary mean things i stop playing ending S2  so when i came back i had the same mind that u could be toxic and not get punished but now i see that u cant be mean and i feel really bad for the things i said.
